column4: Could someone please gimmie a hand? I'm trying to save some files from a dead windows box, and i can't mount the harddrive: it's telling me i need to boot into windows and run chkdsk, but obviously i can't. D:
You did not describe your situation precisely enough. Try to start an Ubuntu live CD and see if you can see this hard drive.
I think you have done it all right. I am not experienced enough to tell you why this partition will not mount. --  I cannot help you. I am sorry.
